name: Gaias Tears
description:
Thanks for checking out "Gaias Tears" an indepdendent style art game.

This is a short fictional retelling of a historical event for the

"historcial game jam 5"

It involves the story of the Baia Mare cyanide spill.

From Wikipedia:

"The Baia Mare cyanide spill was a leak of cyanide near Baia Mare, Romania,

into the Someș River by the gold mining company Aurul,

a joint-venture of the Australian company Esmeralda Exploration

and the Romanian government."
